{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Roku Ultra (4640X).jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = HD and 4K UHD Streaming Media Player with HDR |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.roku.com/products/roku-ultra |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Roku_Ultra_(4640X) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Roku |model = Ultra |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = (4640X) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = media player,media streamer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TC2-R1013 |icid = 5959A-R1014 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MStar;MSO9380;M ARM, MS09380AMZ-R64-DA9B, AT8B873B, 1619S; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;TH58NVG3S0HBAI4; |flash1size = 1 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646E-BCNB; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0,MicroSD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = 4k, HDR, HDMI 2.0a, IR receiver, TOSLINK audio out, |addchip = 4.5V to 18V Input Voltage, 3A/2A Output Current Triple Synchronous Buck Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS65261;TPS, 65261, TI 621, CLFS G4;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/26/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA2F85UP3236 |asin = B01M05030B |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43569;Broadcom(R), BCM43569PKFFBG, UE1610 P12, 574737-40 T3 W; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== CPU: ''MStar'' MSO9380 @1.2GHz (ARM Cortex-A53 Quad Core) {{see also|Roku}} Includes an Advanced Remote with headphones.
==See also== [[Roku]] • [https://www.engadget.com/products/roku/ Roku] • [https://www.engadget.com/2016/11/05/roku-express-ultra-review/ Review] • [https://www.techhive.com/article/3123120/streaming-hardware/roku-reboots-its-entire-lineup-with-five-all-new-express-premiere-and-ultra-models.html Review] • [https://images.techhive.com/images/article/2016/09/rokuplayers-100684136-orig.png Table] *[[Roku Ultra (4640X)]] - ''HD and 4K UHD Streaming Media Player with HDR'' *[[Roku Premiere+ (4630X)]] - ''HD and 4K UHD Streaming Media Player with HDR'' *[[Roku Premiere (4620X)]] - ''HD and 4K UHD Streaming Media Player'' *[[Roku Express+ (3710RW)]] - ''HD Streaming Player'' • [https://www.roku.com/products/roku-express-plus PPage] *[[Roku Express (3700R)]] - ''HD Streaming Player'' • [https://www.roku.com/products/roku-express PPage] • [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01LXJA5JD B01LXJA5JD] *[[Roku Streaming Stick (3600R)]] - ''HD Streaming Player w/ Quad-Core Processor'' *[[Roku 4 (4400X)]] - [https://www.roku.com/products/roku-4 PPage] *[[Roku 3 (4230X)]] - *[[Roku 3 (4200X)]] -
